---
title: "database_migrations_path.yml"

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines a deprecated setting for the database migrations path. It specifies the location of database migration files relative to the current directory.

## Symbols

### `db`
#### Description
The `db` key represents the top-level configuration section for database-related settings.

### `migrations_path`
#### Description
The `migrations_path` key, nested under `db`, specifies the relative path to the directory containing database migration files.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| migrations_path | string | The relative path to the database migrations directory |

#### Outputs
N/A (This is a configuration file, not executable code)

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| db.migrations_path | string | "../config/migrations" | Specifies the relative path to the database migrations directory |

## TODOs
It's important to note that this configuration file is located in a "deprecated" directory, which suggests that this particular way of specifying the database migrations path may be outdated or no longer recommended. Users of this configuration should consider checking for updated methods of specifying the migrations path in the current version of the software.
